name: computerized
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
controlled by or produced by a computer, especially when something was previously done by people or other machines: The county recently switched to computerized voting. Manufacturing processes have become increasingly computerized. Compare
non-computerized
More examplesFewer examplesAll our medical records are now fully computerized.There has been increased use of computerized systems for managing accounts.Studies on computerized driving simulators have shown how mobile phone use affects performance.We live in a highly computerized world.
